title: Introduction to C Programming
description: C is a powerful general-purpose programming language. It can be used to develop software like operating systems, databases, compilers, and so on.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Algorithms: Key to efficient problem-solving in computing, from sorting to searching and beyond.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: C++: A powerful language for Data Structures & Algorithms (DSA), blending OOP with high performance to efficiently tackle complex problems.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Basic Data Structures: Core foundations of organizing and managing data, essential for efficient information processing

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: OOP Python: Object-Oriented Programming in Python, emphasizing modularity and reusability through classes and objects.

title: Software Engineering
description: Software Engineering: Systematic approach to design, develop, and maintain software, ensuring quality, scalability, and reliability.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: AWS & Cloud Computing: Leverage Amazon Web Services for scalable, on-demand resources, revolutionizing IT infrastructure..

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Database (MySQL): Powerful, open-source relational database system, essential for data storage and management in applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Problem-Solving: The art of finding effective solutions, requiring analysis, creativity, and systematic approaches to complex challenges.
